none: 八坂神社新潟県の算額 (現物)・Sangaku of Yasaka Shrine, Niigata (Original)
新潟県南魚沼市六日町1951・1951 Muikamachi, Minamiuonuma City, Niigata Prefecture
富所政継門人諏佐嘉継他1名・Tomi Masakane's disciples Susa Yoshitsugu and 1 other person
八坂神社様には、算額の撮影および掲載の許可を賜り、感謝申し上げます。・We would like to thank Yasaka Shrine for their kind permission to photograph the sangaku and post it in the archive.
算額は一般的に公開されていません。・The sangaku is generally not on public display.
